phone.text: The number cannot be reached now.
Please hang up and try again later.
Hmm, it seems like emergency services are getting interference from a radio station!

tree.text: Oh, hi Larry! Welcome to your tree!
We have tons of things to do here, I SWEAR!!!
Just click on me and I will tell you more. JUST CLICKITY CLICK.
There is currently a map behind me.
Click on it... and you'll see the whole map that you'll be playing on.
And, click on a location when you have the map brought up.
This small action will give you info about that specific area.
I'm no longer providing information. Stop clicking.

walkieTalkie-fiend1.text: Talking Larry, I have a small side quest for you.
Can you please go and get me that giant apple from the medical room?
Get the key, have a small workout, and snatch the apple out
before the security alarm goes off. Be quick though.
PLEASE... I'M DYING RIGHT NOW... PLEAAS-

walkieTalkie-scammer1.text: Hey Larry! Dial 1982166**! Don't ask me why, just do it.

phone-scammer.text: Welcome to Item Manager. Press 1 to get a surprise item.
Welp, it was a scam, but I was smart enough to avoid it.

medical.text: I don't care about him anymore.

snowy.text: Here's some rewards while you're at it.
To reward you for caring for your friend and...
*COUGH* YOU DON'T HAVE THE GIANT APPLE...
GET THE APPLE, THEN COME BACK...

pushGame.text: f'Time's up! The final score is {pushGame.score}'
